abilities.name: Forward Observers
abilities.rule: Each time this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is made by a model in a Guided unit that targets their Spotted unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

abilities.name: Battlesuit Support System
abilities.rule: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

abilities.name: Homing Beacon
abilities.rule:
Once per battle, you can use the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP. The target must be set up within 3" of the bearer’s unit and not within 9" of any enemy units.

***Designer’s Note**: Place a Homing Beacon token next to this unit, removing it once this ability is used.*

■ The Stealth Shas’vre can be equipped with up to two of the following, and can take duplicates:
◦ 1 gun drone
◦ 1 marker drone
◦ 1 shield drone

■ For every 3 models in the unit, 1 model can be equipped with 1 battlesuit support system.
